definitions.definition: To adorn or cover with clothing; to dress; to supply clothes or clothing.
definitions.example: to feed and clothe a family; to clothe oneself extravagantly

definitions.definition: To cover or invest, as if with a garment.
definitions.example: to clothe somebody with authority or power

definitions.definition: Any of a wide variety of articles, usually made of fabrics, animal hair, animal skin, or some combination thereof, used to cover the human body for warmth, to preserve modesty, or for fashion.
An act or instance of putting clothes on.
definitions.example: The clothing and unclothing of the idols was of special significance.

definitions.definition: The art or process of making cloth.
A covering of non-conducting material on the outside of a boiler, or steam chamber, to prevent radiation of heat.
